body.name: Super Comfort Ergonomic Pillow for Neck Head and Shoulder Pain Relief, Odorless Contour Support Pillows for Bed Sleeping, Orthopedic Cervical Spine Stretch Pillow for Side Back Stomach Sleeper
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 40 mins
features: INGENIOUS COMBINATION OF SHREDDED MEMORY FOAM AND COTTON! Kaattop started a sleep revolution with our spine stretch pillow's innovative design! At its central area, soft shredded memory foam cradle your head, gently inviting you to sink into a world of comfort. Surrounding this soft central area, our neck support pillow's cotton fill extends firm and targeted support to your neck. Say farewell to neck pain and discomfort!

TRI-PAIN-RELIEF - SAY GOODBYE TO NECK & SHOULDER PAIN! Kaattop bed pillow adopted a unique low center area and surroundings high design, which maintains the natural curvature of your cervical spine, promoting proper alignment and reducing strain, helping muscles and joints relax. And the ergonomic shape cradles your head, neck, and shoulders, providing a natural fit that feels like it was made just for you. It conforms seamlessly to your shoulder, providing the relief and relaxation you crave.

NO NEED TO SPEND TIME ADJUSTING! Tired of battling pain with ordinary pillows or spending time getting used to special contour shaped ones? Compared to them, our neck pillow doesn't need to compromise on comfort or support and even lets you fall in love with it from the first night. For sleepers of side, our pillow especially raises the sides for extra support. Back sleepers can indulge in cradling softness, while stomach sleepers can find their sweet spot with a lower loft for ideal comfort.

SAFETY, ODORLESS, BREATHABLE - ENJOY OUR PREMIUM PILLOWS! Our high-quality pillows for bed have been Certified with CertiPUR-US & Oeko-Tex to meet the highest safety standards. With our firm pillow, you can finally enjoy a restful night's sleep without any worries about toxic materials or unwanted smells. Meantime, we carefully selected pillowcases with both skin-friendly and breathable. The side mesh pillowcase ensures optimal breathability, keeping you cool and refreshed throughout the night.

HASSLE-FREE PURCHASE EXPERIENCE! If you're tired of restless nights and neck discomfort, it's time to try Kaattop cervical pillow for neck pain relief! If you have any inquiries about our neck pillows for pain relief sleeping, please feel free to contact Kaattop customer service. It's a good gift for dad, mom, fathers, mothers, girlfriends, boyfriends, husbands, wife & colleagues, birthdays Christmas gifts. Buy Kaattop ergonomic pillow for neck pain! Experience the bliss of pain-free sleeping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This $35 Pillow Has Fixed 8 Yrs of Neck/Shoulder Cramping
reviews.reviewText: I've tried about 8 cervical pillows for neck vertebrae pain ranging from almost flat to winged to curved to water filled. Prices ranged from $10 to $120. Nothing was great. I'm pretty active and my chiropractor is great but I have woken up with neck/shoulder pain most days for the last 8 years. Pretty much figured I've always got to stretch it out before it feels decent every dang morning. I read the feedback for this pillow and liked the idea behind the design, plus liked that you could adjust it by removing foam if needed. I popped it out of the box, let it expand, then squished and fluffed all the sections so that the foam could do it's thing. This is my pillow. ❤️ Zero neck pain, zero shoulder cramping. It's day 5 and I am blissed out. Ordered another so I have one in reserve. This pillow is amazing!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After several weeks of daily use, the pillow has maintained its shape
reviews.reviewText: The memory foam used in the construction of this pillow seems to be of high quality. It perfectly contours to the shape of my head and neck, cradling me in a cloud of comfort. After several weeks of daily use, the pillow has maintained its shape and support, proving that the quality of materials used is exceptional. While the price may initially seem steep, the long-term benefits far outweigh the cost. Investing in my sleep health has been one of the best decisions I've made, and this pillow has been the cornerstone of that investment. I'm very happy my hubby talked me into investing in a more expensive pillow, it is worth it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hard as a brick, extremely elevated neck pain
reviews.reviewText: Stay far away from this sandbag of a pillow. Clearly the designers never even tested it. It's awkward to use: there's a very uncomfortable ridge for the next which is supposed to comfort the spine at the base of the neck but because it's so unforgivingly rigid, it's caused excessive neck pain. Had to discontinue use after only a few nights. What a shame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is durable, comfortable, and effective
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow after suffering from chronic neck and shoulder pain for months. I was skeptical at first, but I decided to give it a try based on the positive reviews and the ergonomic design. I am so glad I didThe pillow is made of shredded memory foam and cotton, which makes it soft yet supportive. It conforms to my head and neck shape, providing optimal alignment and comfort. It also has a zipper that allows me to adjust the loft and firmness of the pillow according to my preference. The pillowcase is removable and washable, which is very convenient. This pillow is worth every penny. It is durable, comfortable, and effective. I highly recommend it to anyone who suffers from neck, head, or shoulder pain, or who simply wants to improve their sleep quality. It is truly a super comfort ergonomic pillow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one!
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a few "special" neck pillows, this one is THE one that works for my neck pain. Great neck support for back sleepers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this pillow. It hold my head in the perfect position while I'm resting and sleeping. Several times over the past few months I've had a cramp in my neck upon waking, but I have not felt that at all since using this pillow. It has definitely improved the quality of my sleep and I feel up feeling so much better. What a difference a good pillow makes in helping you sleep better and helping you wake up feeling ready for the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I am baffled by the good reviews
reviews.reviewText: If you ever wondered what it was like to sleep on a giant donut with your head falling throught the middle, look no further. Mine has zero support in the center and was way too firm around the outside. I had to switch back to my old pillow the first night. Ridiculous for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
